name: Generic
desc: Well something isn't working correctly and we don't know what.

name: Ok
desc:
Mmm...? Hello?
Everything seems fine, What are you doing here?

name: Unauthorized
desc: You're not supposed to be here, leave!

name: Forbidden
desc:
Huh, Something broke...
Maybe try again later?

name: Not Found
desc: We couldn't find the page that you were looking for.

name: Request Timeout
desc: We couldn't prossess the request on time.

name: Internal Server Error
desc: We are probably under a DDOS attack, hold on.
